name: bank_app
description: Easy Bank app with server and client

scripts.dev: set PORT=3005 && nodemon --watch bank_server.js --watch server/public --watch bank_client/public --watch bank_client/src --watch bank_client/src/components --watch bank_client/src/functions --ext js,jsx,html --ignore .json bank_server.js

author: Daniel Burlacenko
